[Java] Class AbstractSession

java.lang.Object
  org.grails.datastore.mapping.core.AbstractAttributeStoringSession
      org.grails.datastore.mapping.core.AbstractSession
All Implemented Interfaces:
SessionImplementor
@java.lang.SuppressWarnings({"rawtypes", "unchecked"})
public abstract class AbstractSession
extends AbstractAttributeStoringSession

Abstract implementation of the Session interface that uses a list of Persister instances to save, update and delete instances

Parameters:
Authors:
Graeme Rocher
Since:
1.0

protected void flushPendingInserts(java.util.Map inserts)

deleteAll

public int deleteAll(QueryableCriteria criteria)
This default implementation of the deleteAll method is unlikely to be optimal as it iterates and deletes each object. Subclasses should override to optimize for the batch operation capability of the underlying datastore
Parameters:
criteria - The criteria

flush

public void flush()

flushPendingInserts

protected void flushPendingInserts(java.util.Map inserts)
The default implementation of flushPendingInserts is to iterate over each insert operations and execute them one by one. This may be suboptimal for stores that support batch insert operations. Subclasses can override this method to implement batch insert more efficiently.
Parameters:
inserts - The insert operations

flushPendingUpdates

protected void flushPendingUpdates(java.util.Map updates)
The default implementation of flushPendingUpdates is to iterate over each update operation and execute them one by one. This may be suboptimal for stores that support batch update operations. Subclasses can override this method to implement batch update more efficiently.
Parameters:
updates

updateAll

public int updateAll(QueryableCriteria criteria, java.util.Map properties)
This default implementation of updateAll is unlikely to be optimal as it iterates and updates each object one by one. Subclasses should override to optimize for the batch operation capability of the underlying datastore
Parameters:
criteria - The criteria
properties - The properties
